original_text: So then, my Christian friends, we are not children of the woman who is a slave. No, we are children of the free woman. 4: So then, my Christian friends, we are not children of the woman who is a slave. No, we are children of the free woman.
korean_text: 그런즉 형제들아 우리는 여종의 자녀가 아니요 자유 있는 여자의 자녀니라

sentences.original_text: we are not children of the woman who is a slave
No, we are children of the free woman
